mapper.insert: insert into spring_blogs (blog_no, blog_title, blog_writer, blog_content) values (spring_blog_seq.nextval, #{title}, #{writer.id}, #{content})
mapper.select: select A.blog_no as no, A.blog_title as title, A.blog_writer as "writer.id", -- User 객체의 id에 값이 저장 B.user_name as "writer.name", -- User 객체의 name에 값이 저장 B.user_email as "writer.email", -- User 객체의 email에 값이 저장 A.blog_content as content, A.blog_likes as likes, A.blog_comment_counts as commentCounts, A.blog_created_date as createDate from spring_blogs A, spring_user B where A.blog_writer = B.user_id and A.blog_no = #{value}
